SEARCH
Package hw4

Class EpidemicGraph

java.lang.Object
hw4.EpidemicGraph
public class EpidemicGraph extends Object
The EpidemicGraph class represents an epidemic simulation.

    • editConfigs

      public boolean editConfigs(float d, int t, float l)
      Changes the configurations for this graph.
      Parameters:
      d - death chance
      t - infection duration
      l - lambda
      Returns:
      true if changes were made, false if not.

    • initialize

      public String initialize(String filename)
      Initializes this EpidemicGraph's graph using the file with the filename input.
      Parameters:
      filename - the name or path of the file to be used to initialize this graph.
      Returns:
      "Success" on successful initialization, or an error message as a String.

    • getState

      public hw4.NodeStates getState(String label)
      Returns the current state of the node with label label.
      Parameters:
      label - the label of the node to get the state of.
      Returns:
      graph.getState(label) if the node with label label does not exist in this graph, returns null.
